description_html: Transform an overhead space with the soft texture and geometric pattern of Clario baffles. This suspended, dimensional design diffuses and absorbs noise to create more intimate and welcoming environments. Clario is an ideal solution for conference rooms or high conversation areas. Clario comes pre-assembled for simple snap-in installation on existing 15/16" grid systems. Choose from two sizes and eight Sola Felt colors with our online configuration tool.
